title: Boutique Spa Heaven in Baden-Baden
description: Forget the rest of the world and retreat to the acclaimed Brenners Park-Hotel & Spa, one of Germany's most celebrated hotels in the picturesque town of Baden-Baden. Spend four nights in this oasis of peace and enjoy daily buffet breakfast, entrance to the Baden-Baden Casino and Caracalla thermal baths, a bottle of wine on arrival with fine chocolate pralines and a glorious EUR 85 credit for the incredible hotel's spa.

title: South Germany Stately Thermal Spa Hotel with Onsite Dining & Wellness Facilities
description:
Nestled in Baden-Baden's historic parklands, Brenners Park-Hotel & Spa whispers tales of European royalty, where the Black Forest meets Belle Époque grandeur. This masterpiece rises above manicured gardens and houses the legendary Villa Stéphanie Spa - a 5,000-square-metre wellness playground with magnificent park views.

Let your tastebuds dance in Michelin-worthy dining venues that a modern-day Gatsby would call home. Whether you're sipping champagne in the glass-wrapped Wintergarten watching the seasons paint the Lichtentaler Allee, or making memories over signature cocktails at Oleander Bar, every corner of this hotel serves up a feast for the senses.
